name: CQ.Ext.AbstractManager
doc: Base Manager class - extended by ComponentMgr and PluginMgr

props.name: all
props.doc: Contains all of the items currently managed

methods.name: get
methods.doc:
Returns a component by id.
For additional details see CQ.Ext.util.MixedCollection.get.

methods.doc: Checks if a Component type is registered.

methods.name: register
methods.doc: Registers an item to be managed
